thread.title: Ground News - On the occasion of the new year... A special interview by His Holiness Pope Tawadros II “In the evening with Qaswa”
thread.title_full: Ground News - On the occasion of the new year... A special interview by His Holiness Pope Tawadros II “In the evening with Qaswa”

author: elfagr.org
title: Ground News - On the occasion of the new year... A special interview by His Holiness Pope Tawadros II “In the evening with Qaswa”
text:
Summary by elfagr.org On her program “In the Evening with Kaswa” on CBC channel, the media outlet Kaswa Al-Khalali will hold a special interview on Saturday and Sunday with His Holiness Pope Tawadros II, Pope of Alexandria and Patriarch of the St. Mark Evangelism, on the occasion of the New Year. The interview of media outlet Qaswa Al-Khalali with His Holiness Pope Tawadros comes for the first time outside studios Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
